attributes.additional_details: Because Its Time It Is Done!! Too Many Abusers Coming Back Out After Short Sentences & The VICTIMS Have To Deal With The Possibility Of Them Being Released!! Why Does Sexual Abuse Have A Short Sentence?? It Should Be Up There With Murder! Too Many Are Getting Away With Sexual Assault, As Have Money / Power & Think They Can Buy Their Way Out! NO ONE Is Above The LAW & Should B Dealt With Accordingly!
attributes.background: Change The Charges For Sexual Abuse! Whether Domestic Violence, Rape, etc Should Hold A HIGHER SENTENCING Than What Exists Already!!

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by 'higher charges'.  We could accept a petition for longer minimum and/or maximum sentences if that's what you'd like to see happen.
